text: Maybelle Addington (or Maybelle Carter; 10 May 1909 â€“ 23 October 1978) was an American country musician. She was a member of the Carter Family act. She released several albums of her own. Carter was the mother of June Carter Cash, wife of Johnny Cash. Addington was born in Nickelsville, Virginia. She died from poor health at age sixty-nine. Category:Singers from Virginia Category:American country musicians Category:1909 births Category:1978 deaths
title: Maybelle Carter
